data.scheme_name: Karnataka Data Centre Policy 2022 - 2027 - Land Subsidy - Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provide capital subsidy of 10% for data centre entities on purchase/lease of land, maximum Rs 300 lakhs.
data.eligibility: Entities located outside Bengaluru Urban District with a registered office in Karnataka under the Companies Act, 2013, or registered under the Karnataka Shops & Commercial Establishment Act, 1961.
data.conditions:
Entities must apply for Land Subsidy within 12 months from the start of commercial operations.
Entities must be registered with KITS, Department of Electronics, IT, Bt, and S&T as a Data Centre Entity.
data.beneficiaries: Entities located outside Bengaluru Urban District with a registered office in Karnataka under the Companies Act, 2013, or registered under the Karnataka Shops & Commercial Establishment Act, 1961.
data.prerequisites:
Entities must apply for Land Subsidy within 12 months from the start of commercial operations.
Entities must be registered with KITS, Department of Electronics, IT, Bt, and S&T as a Data Centre Entity.
data.context: The Government of Karnataka (GoK), through the Karnataka Innovation and Technology Society (KITS), has introduced the Karnataka Data Centre Policy 2022 - 2027. This policy aims to support the data centre industry located within the state by providing various incentives and offerings.
data.objective:
This policy aims to make Karnataka an integral part of the digital supply chain and to develop a competitive data centre industry in the state.
It is expected to drive growth in allied sectors in terms of capacity expansion and jobs, and create economic opportunities with significant trickle - down effects in supporting economic activity in allied industries/services.
data.description:
Scheme provide10% land subsidy shall be provided to data centres on purchase/lease of land outside Bengaluru urban district. Land subsidy will be provided for land area up to and not exceeding 10 acres and on actual procurement cost if procured from KIADB or any other agencies of GoK. The subsidy for land procured from other sources will be as per the uidance value of land at the time of procurement. Cap on the maximum amount of land
subsidy shall be limited to 10% of the total land cost or Rs 300 lakhs, whichever is less.

data.funding_mechanism: Fund/Incentive will be released on approval of application by the concerned authority after fulfilment of condition.
data.additional_info:
Applicants are required to make a one - time application processing fee payment for availing benefits under the Policy.
For registration fee with KITS/department is Rs. 10,000/ - + (18% GST) for Data Centre Operators/ Developers/ Service Providers and this fee is non - refundable.
For application processing fee for availing benefits under the Policy like Special Provisions in Building Norms, Capital Subsidy, Land Subsidy, Exemption of Payment of Stamp Duty & Concessional Registration Charges, Exemption of Land Conversion Fees, Power Tariff Concession, Green Power Tariff Reimbursement and Exemption from Electricity Duty is Rs. 10,000/ - + (18% GST) and this fee is non - refundable.
Special Provisions in Building Norms are as follows:
Ground coverage: Upton 60% ground coverage shall be allowed to the data Centre parks/units.
Floor Area Ratio: Data Centre entities shall be allowed for 3.0 + 1.0 (Purchasable) FAR. Basement parking, storage and space used for DG sets installation will not be considered as part of FAR.
Car Parking: Car Parking for data Centre Entities shall be considered as 1 Parking Space per 100 Square meters of designated office area as a threshold requirement in the approved Plan (or) 1 Parking Space per 300 square meters of total built - up area at the option of the developer.
Floor to ceiling height (One floor): There will be no restriction on floor to ceiling height subject to there being no mezzanine floor, and compliance with overall height regulations and suitable structural and fire safety regulations.
Installation of chillers on the rooftop: shall be permitted without inclusion in FAR, subject to structural safety norms.
Boundary Wall: Exemption on the height norms for the construction of boundary walls up to 3.6 m with 600 mm fencing (Y or spherical) on top of the boundary wall.
Opening in Building: The data centre building shall be allowed to install minimum number of windows (5% of building facade), subject to compliance with building and fire safety regulations.
Multi - level DG stacking: Structure up to G + 5 shall be permissible for Installation of DG sets including multi level DG stacking, subject to NOC from Fire Safety Department and shall not be considered as part of FAR.
Data Centre/Parks in Any Land Zone: Setting up of data Centres would be permitted in any land zone namely commercial, industrial, and institutional to avoid incurring additional costs.
data.checklist_info_a:
i. Application form in the prescribed format provided in Section 4.5
ii. Signed Undertaking in the prescribed format provided in Section 5.10
iii. Copy of the Provisional Registration Certificate issued by KITS/Department
iv. Copy of the Detailed Project Report (DPR) duly signed by the promoter (detailing project cost and means of finance details, buildings, and civil works estimations etc.)
v. CA Certification on the total project cost
vi. Self-attested copy of the Approval Letter/Government order from the State Level Committees (SLSWCC/SHLCC) or District Level Committees (DLSWCC) regarding the Approval/clearance accorded to the project/unit
vii. As applicable, shall submit the following:
• Stamp Duty Exemption of Loan
a. Self- Attested copy of loan sanction letter issued by the concerned financing Bank/Authority 
• Stamp Duty Exemption of Land (KIADB/KSSIDC/KEONICS)
a. Self- Attested Copy of shed/land allotment order
b. Self- Attested Copy of Possession Certificate
c. Self- Attested Copy of the unregistered lease deed/lease-cum-sale deed
• Stamp Duty Exemption of Absolute sale deed (KIADB/KSSIDC/KEONICS)
a. Self-attested copy of lease cum sale deed
b. Self-attested copy of unregistered absolute sale deed
